subject: Re: Portable Ghost Box System video
author: LC Duplatt
full_text:
Thanks, Mike.  

I am still working on different set-ups in a sound chamber.  I 
realize the chamber is not necessary, but I think with the 12-469, it 
helps to run it into a box to mix it, which helps remove the "click" 
noise received while it sweeps the AM band.  Also, I want to try 
bouncing down an echo chamber, so it slows the sound down a bit to 
possibly make it easier to hear. Still experimenting here.

LC
http://www.AngelsGhosts.com
